short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your year's progress and manage your goals on every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Year Progress & Goals Tracker

Stay motivated and track your yearly progress with this simple yet powerful new tab extension!

Key Features:
- Visual Year Progress: See your year at a glance with an intuitive heatmap showing weeks passed and remaining.
- Weekly Updates: Get informed about the current week number and how many weeks are left in the year.
- Goal Setting: Set up to 10 important goals for the year.
- Goal Management: Easily add, delete, and mark goals as completed.
- Progress Tracking: View your goal completion percentage to stay motivated.

Perfect for:
- Professionals looking to stay on track with yearly objectives
- Students aiming to achieve academic goals throughout the year
- Anyone wanting to visualize time passing and make the most of their year

Every new tab becomes an opportunity to reflect on your progress and stay focused on what matters most to you this year. Make each week count!

Start your journey to a more productive and goal-oriented year today!
